content: One of the more recent drivers of higher repayment rates is really the flip side of amazingly strong credit and healthy consumer balance sheets and we certainly expect consumer credit to gradually normalize, maybe you know it’s kind of been happening a little slower than one might otherwise expect. But what we will -- the things that we will throttle along the way are certain marketing choices, certain product choices, but that one, that I partly shared -- I want to share this a little bit more about this today that that’s a journey that Capital One has been on as part of our central part of our strategy in Card for a lot of years.
